VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Boutique Inns relative to Budget Motels?
SRP.A: Boutique Inns is {above} Budget Motels in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total hotel occupancy rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Luxury Resorts}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total hotel occupancy rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Budget Motels}.

VE.Q: What is Boutique Inns's Hotel Occupancy Rate in 1981?
VE.A: Boutique Inns's hotel occupancy rate in 1981 is {100} %.

VE.Q: What is Luxury Resorts's Hotel Occupancy Rate in 1986?
VE.A: Luxury Resorts's hotel occupancy rate in 1986 is {100} %.

VE.Q: What are the hotel occupancy rate of Airbnb Hosts, Vacation Rentals, and Boutique Inns in 1986?
VE.A: Airbnb Hosts's hotel occupancy rate is {100} %, Vacation Rentals's hotel occupancy rate is {58.97} %, Boutique Inns's hotel occupancy rate is {100} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Hotel Occupancy Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum hotel occupancy rate is {31.37} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Hotel Occupancy Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum hotel occupancy rate is {100.00} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Hotel Occupancy Rate level recorded for Airbnb Hosts?
What is the lowest Hotel Occupancy Rate level recorded for Airbnb Hosts?
EVJ.A: Airbnb Hosts's lowest recorded level is approximately {74.39} % in {1973}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Hotel Occupancy Rate?
SC.A: The average total hotel occupancy rate is {420.75} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Hotel Occupancy Rate exceed 429.63 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Hotel Occupancy Rate fall between 401.46 and 443.72 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Hotel Occupancy Rate go below 415.55 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Hotel Occupancy Rate in 1973 higher or lower than in 1985?
NC.A: The total hotel occupancy rate in 1973 was {lower} than in 1985.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1989, was the average total Hotel Occupancy Rate higher or lower than between 1977 and 1978?
NC.A: The average total hotel occupancy rate between 1983 and 1989 was {lower} than between 1977 and 1978.

NC.Q: Between 1974 and 1984, did the total Hotel Occupancy Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1974 and 1985?
NC.A: The change in total hotel occupancy rate between 1974 and 1984 was {larger} than between 1974 and 1985.

NC.Q: Between 1975 and 1986, was the average total Hotel Occupancy Rate higher or lower than between 1976 and 1980?
NC.A: The average total hotel occupancy rate between 1975 and 1986 was {lower} than between 1976 and 1980.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Luxury Resorts} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Budget Motels, Vacation Rentals, Airbnb Hosts, Boutique Inns, Luxury Resorts}.
